title: Donald J. Trump: A President Like No Other
description: Conrad Black, bestselling author of Franklin Delano Champion of Freedom and Richard M. A Life in Full , turns his attention to his "friend" President Donald J. Trump and provides the most intriguing and significant analysis yet of Trump's political rise. Ambitious in intellectual scope, contrarian in many of its opinions, and admirably concise, this is surely set to be one of the most provocative political books you are likely to read this year.
author: Conrad Black
